projects.title: UniMap
projects.description: UniMap is an iOS application designed to bring UTSC students closer together, providing a hub for all events on campus. Developed a user event upload functionality on a Swift iOS application using MVVM architecture, implementing form validation, custom feedback patterns, focus-state control, and dynamic styling for a smooth user experience.

projects.title: Calendrier
projects.description: Calendrier is an iOS-based note-taking application using SwiftData (for data persistence), providing users with a clean and simple (yet cute!) interface for managing text and drawing notes. Utilized Swiftdata for data persistence, while maintaining a unique, accessible UI.

projects.title: WellGlobe | TerraHacks 25'
projects.description: A smart travel health companion that gives you real-time advisories, vaccine checklists, and personalized safety tips so you can explore the world confidently and safely.

projects.title: Async Battleship
projects.description: An asynchronous C server for Battleship using select(), non-blocking I/O, and socket programming to handle multiple concurrent clients with robust error handling.

projects.title: Tetris | MIPS32 Assembly
projects.description: Implemented a simplified version of the classic Tetris game using MIPS assembly. Features real-time piece movement, rotation, collision detection, line clearing, and score tracking, all rendered on a memory-mapped framebuffer. Optimized low-level logic and display routines to handle game state updates efficiently on limited hardware.
